content.instructions: Select the correct response. Then select the I'm done button to check your answers. When you have completed the exercise, select Next to continue.
content.question: Management reserves the right to hire, assign, direct, lay off, retain, suspend, remove, reduce in grade or pay, or take other disciplinary action against employees.
